name: Ritualball
description:
:
Game made during 48h for Global Game Jam. Entry: http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/ritualball . Here you can play post-compo version with single player mode.

Game use LibGDX framework, GDX-AI and Box2dLights.

Music: Professor Kliq - Plastic & Flashing Lights https://soundcloud.com/professorkliq/plastic-flashing-lights-1
